bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Measurement of Emissions from FM and Television Broadcast Receivers in the Frequency Range of 9 kHz to 40 GHz
Redline
IEEE Standard for Measurement of Emissions from FM and Television Broadcast Receivers in the Frequency Range of 9 kHz to 40 GHz - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 187-2018 (Revision of IEEE Std 187-2003) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Spurious radiation from sound and television broadcast receivers are possible sources of interference with other radio services. This standard describes the potential sources of spurious radiation from receivers intended for the reception of sound and television broadcast, and the measurement methods for them.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
